Name: Burr's Black Cobras
Details: Once part of the storied mercenary unit the Crater Cobras, Burr's Black Cobras have recently reformed on Outreach after a bitter experience with the Free Worlds League after suffering from a disastrous act of sabotage while landing on Nanking.  Burr's Black Cobras's are a reinforced battalion of mechs, and are currently working on several short-term contracts to rebuild.
